content:
Discover the History of Prince Orpheus Type Quest Act Act 2 Location Moonrise Towers Reward --

Discover the History of Prince Orpheus

Discover the History of Prince Orpheus is a Quest in Baldur's Gate 3. Discover the History of Prince Orpheus can be acquired during Act 2. Completing Quests allows players to learn more about the world and characters in Baldur's Gate 3, as well as earning more loot and experience to become more powerful.
